summary: Adds a shield to the game that looks like the Windhelm Guard shield, that normal Stormcloak\'s will equip!
descriptionHtml:
The ENB used in the screenshot is:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27331]Real Skyrim ENB-SweetFX[/url].

Description:
A rather simple mod which adds a shield to the game that has the same look as the Windhelm Guard\'s shield that Stormcloaks will equip. I feel it goes better with the Stormcloak look better than the Hide/Steel shield.
The shield has the same stats as the Imperial Shield and can be upgraded the same, so it is balanced.

Installation:
Simply extract to your \\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data directory.

Uninstallation:
Simply remove the \"Stormcloak Shield.esp\" from your \\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data directory.

[youtube]RZLgdpsMqNs[/youtube]

Permissions:
I give full permission for anyone to use how they please.

Credits:
Bethesda - Making the original shield.
author: Maddo3
